alert.note: Alert for Bayfield; Douglas (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Duluth (Northeast Minnesota and Northern Wisconsin)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued December 12 at 5:44AM CST by NWS Duluth
info.description: ...BRIEF BURST OF HEAVY SNOW EARLY THIS MORNING... At 545 AM CST heavy snow showers were along a line from near Cromwell to Duluth to Two Harbors to Brimson MN. The heavy snow showers were moving southeast at 30 to 35 mph. Expect visibility to drop rapidly to 1/4 to 1/2 mile. Quick snow accumulation on roads of a few tenths of an inch may create slippery stretches on roads. Areas impacted through 8 AM will include Cloquet, Superior, Maple, Solon Springs, Iron River, and Port Wing. This includes I-35 between Duluth and Moose Lake, Highway 53 in Wisconsin between Duluth and Solon Springs, and Highway 2 in Wisconsin between Duluth and Moquah. Be prepared for areas of blowing and drifting snow. This could lead to temporary whiteout conditions and the potential for dangerous driving conditions. If you are traveling and encounter adverse winter driving conditions...reduce speed and make sure headlights are on.
